articles.title: Blue Jays' Guerrero Jr. wins Gold Glove Award - TSN
articles.description: Toronto Blue Jays star Vladimir Guerrero Jr. has won the Gold Glove Award for American League first basemen, it was announced Tuesday.
articles.content:
Toronto Blue Jays star Vladimir Guerrero Jr. has won the Gold Glove Award for American League first basemen, it was announced Tuesday.

articles.title: US responds to backlash over security threat alerts in SA and Nigeria - News24
articles.description: US State Department spokesperson Edward "Ned" Price says the country has "no higher priority than the safety and security of American citizens around the world".
articles.content:
• Last week the US issued security threat alerts in Nigeria and South Africa.
  • There were no details about the threats.
  • In SA, it almost amounted to a diplomatic tiff.
